srengine

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • srengine.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHitBox

    public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHitBox
    This class represents rectangle with specific width, height and angle of rotation
    Author:
    Vojtech 'Rain' Vladyka, Jaroslav 'Sit' Schmidt
